meanings.definition: The process of creating color prints from a series of lithographic stones, each of which carries a different color ink.
meanings.sent1: Chromolithography involves using various stones to make colorful prints.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a beautiful chromolithography of a vibrant landscape.
meanings.sent3: During the art class, the students tried chromolithography and ended up with rainbow-colored hands.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a canvas, and the memories painted on it through chromolithography were vivid and varied.
meanings.sent5: The chromolithography of the sunset was so lifelike that it seemed to glow on the paper.
